attributes.action: give equal rights for all age groups requiring funding whilst unemployed from the gov.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i feel there should be equal rights in all ages to access extra funding for training and appreticships whilst unemployed, not just some targeted  suggestive problem group/s. as the gov wants eqaulity surely everyone should benifit equally and not just targeted age groups.
